name: @pixart/text-to-pixel-converter
description: Turn your text into stunning pixel art with PixArt! Our library provides an easy-to-use function that converts any text into a matrix of pixel data, allowing you to create beautiful pixel art with ease. Whether you're a graphic designer, game developer, or just looking to add some unique style to your project, PixArt is the perfect solution for creating eye-catching typography and imagery. So why settle for boring text when you can create stunning pixel art with PixArt?
author: Rkobuki
